entity.description: Person with access to the Microsoft CRM system and who owns objects in the Microsoft CRM database.

attributes.name: systemUserId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user.

attributes.name: organizationId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the user.

attributes.name: businessUnitId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit with which the user is associated.

attributes.name: parentSystemUserId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the manager of the user.

attributes.name: firstName
attributes.description: First name of the user.

attributes.name: salutation
attributes.description: Salutation for correspondence with the user.

attributes.name: middleName
attributes.description: Middle name of the user.

attributes.name: lastName
attributes.description: Last name of the user.

attributes.name: personalEMailAddress
attributes.description: Personal email address of the user.

attributes.description: Full name of the user.

attributes.name: nickName
attributes.description: Nickname of the user.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title of the user.

attributes.name: internalEMailAddress

attributes.name: jobTitle
attributes.description: Job title of the user.

attributes.name: mobileAlertEMail
attributes.description: Mobile alert email address for the user.

attributes.description: Preferred email address for the user.

attributes.name: homePhone
attributes.description: Home phone number for the user.

attributes.description: Mobile phone number for the user.

attributes.name: preferredPhoneCode
attributes.description: Preferred phone number for the user.

attributes.name: preferredAddressCode
attributes.description: Preferred address for the user.

attributes.name: photoUrl
attributes.description: URL for the Website on which a photo of the user is located.

attributes.name: domainName
attributes.description: Active Directory domain of which the user is a member.

attributes.name: passportLo
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the user was created.

attributes.name: passportHi
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: disabledReason
attributes.description: Reason for disabling the user.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the user was last modified.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the user.

attributes.name: employeeId
attributes.description: Employee identifier for the user.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the user.

attributes.name: isDisabled
attributes.description: Information about whether the user is enabled.

attributes.name: governmentId
attributes.description: Government identifier for the user.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version number of the user.

attributes.description: Whether to display the user in service views.

attributes.description: Fiscal calendar associated with the user.

attributes.description: Check if user is a setup user.

attributes.description: Windows Live ID

attributes.description: Incoming email delivery method for the user.

attributes.description: Outgoing email delivery method for the user.

attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: accessMode
attributes.description: Type of user.

attributes.name: inviteStatusCode
attributes.description: User invitation status.

attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: yomiFullName
attributes.description: Pronunciation of the full name of the user, written in phonetic hiragana or katakana characters.

attributes.description: Pronunciation of the last name of the user, written in phonetic hiragana or katakana characters.

attributes.description: Pronunciation of the middle name of the user, written in phonetic hiragana or katakana characters.

attributes.description: Check if user is an integration user.

attributes.name: defaultFiltersPopulated
attributes.description: Indicates if default outlook filters have been populated.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the systemuser.

attributes.name: queueId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the default queue for the user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the systemuser.

attributes.name: emailRouterAccessApproval
attributes.description: Shows the status of the primary email address.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the systemuser.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the systemuser with respect to the base currency.

attributes.name: CALType
attributes.description: License type of user.

attributes.name: isLicensed
attributes.description: Information about whether the user is licensed.

attributes.name: isSyncWithDirectory
attributes.description: Information about whether the user is synced with the directory.

attributes.name: yammerEmailAddress
attributes.description: User's Yammer login email address

attributes.name: yammerUserId
attributes.description: User's Yammer ID

attributes.name: defaultMailbox
attributes.description: Select the mailbox associated with this user.

attributes.name: userLicenseType
attributes.description: Shows the type of user license.

attributes.name: entityImageId
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: address2Composite
attributes.description: Shows the complete secondary address.

attributes.name: address1Composite
attributes.description: Shows the complete primary address.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the process.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

attributes.name: isEmailAddressApprovedByO365Admin
attributes.description: Shows the status of approval of the email address by O365 Admin.
attributes.displayName: Email Address O365 Admin Approval Status

attributes.name: positionId
attributes.description: User's position in hierarchical security model.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: sharePointEmailAddress
attributes.description: SharePoint Work Email Address

attributes.name: mobileOfflineProfileId
attributes.description: Items contained with a particular SystemUser.

attributes.name: defaultOdbFolderName
attributes.description: Type a default folder name for the user's OneDrive For Business location.
attributes.displayName: Default OneDrive for Business Folder Name

attributes.name: applicationId
attributes.description: The identifier for the application. This is used to access data in another application.

attributes.name: applicationIdUri
attributes.description: The URI used as a unique logical identifier for the external app. This can be used to validate the application.

attributes.name: azureActiveDirectoryObjectId
attributes.description: This is the application directory object Id.

attributes.name: identityId
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.description: Unique identifier of the territory to which the user is assigned.
